segments.text: I think the woman is just trying to keep things clean, but she’s failing miserably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and she’s just standing there, drying a plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost like she’s in a trance, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids, on the other hand, are fully aware of what they’re doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is going to fall, and it’s going to be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, like it’s the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone steps in before something really bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
